Text Main.data: Siwa Palm is a leading agricultural company with decades of experience, specializing in growing Medjool and Siwa dates in Siwa Oasis and Western Oases.

Text Secondary.data: Founded in 2001 as an Egyptian joint-stock company, it takes quality as its motto in production and export. It has won several awards as the best producer of semi-dry Medjool dates, and strives for global leadership.

Cultural Heritage.data: We honor and preserve the rich agricultural traditions of Siwa while embracing innovation to enhance our farming practices.

Quality Excellence.data: We are committed to producing only the finest dates, ensuring each fruit meets our strict quality standards before reaching our customers.

Sustainability.data: We employ eco-friendly farming practices that preserve the delicate ecosystem of Siwa Oasis while producing exceptional crops.
